welcome_message_body: Welcome to Saint Helens, a charming city known for its rich industrial heritage and vibrant community. We invite you to explore our beautiful surroundings, immerse yourself in our culture, and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a wide range of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used for domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds and no ads.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Warton Airport is reserved for VIP and private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
